name: Capone
description: What is the project about? We are Capone, Capone mafia... We came out of nowhere with the best MEME token on the BSC. We are ready to compete with other tokens in a fair fight! We are family and will help everyone to reach their goals, we will try our best to make it number 1 BSC token! A lot of things incoming, we have a lot of secret updates in our hand and we gonna release them soon! What makes your project unique? We are very unique, not typical meme token as everyone else have. We have unique website, design, contract. While people do many same tokens, we are doing something reall coool. History of your project. We were looking at other project on the coin gecko... and decided. we need to make the best meme token. But let's make it serious, apart from other tokens, we created CAPONE token. Whatâ€™s next for your project? We are planning to add more features soon. We wanna add and make our own real NFTs, which you could buy only with Capone tokens. We will do our swap, special staking system(low apr staking with lock). Also, we are planning to launch some 50/50 games. What can your token be used for? You can use the token to buy it as MEME token. Also, we are planning to add some features like staking and CAPONE NFTs where you will need to have some CAPONE tokens.
